snippet.title: Siren Head: Awakening 1.3 Official Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
Hello Players! This is an update we've been working on and discussing since the launch of the game nearly two months ago. We have read all your comments and criticisms, and we couldn't agree more on some of the things mentioned by you.

We want to share something with you that we feel is important for you to know. Unfortunately, the reason why this update was delayed for a minimum of 3 weeks is because some of us at Prisma Games have tested positive for Covid-19, and hence work on the game had to be paused. We are feeling much better now, and we hope you are too. Stay safe, and enjoy the update!

Siren Head: Awakening 1.3 Changelogs:
https://store.steampowered.com/news/app/1443490/view/2904223825290610044

Siren Head: Awakening on Steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1443490
